title: Historic Family Haven with Modern Comforts in Stare Miasto
description: Experience timeless charm in this elegantly renovated five-bedroom house set in the heart of Zamosc's historic Stare Miasto. Spanning 238 sqm, this exceptional family home seamlessly blends classic architectural details—arched windows, original exposed beams—and sophisticated modern conveniences. Families will love the generous fenced yard, perfect for play, while features like the heated driveway and elevator offer comfort in every season. A gracious guest bathroom and thoughtful storage enhance its practical appeal.
neighborhood_description: Stare Miasto enchants with its picturesque, green spaces and protected historic charm, yet embraces a forward-thinking spirit with strong connections to local tech sectors and start-ups. Enjoy a balanced lifestyle within walking distance to vibrant cafés, leafy parks, and excellent schools. Quick access to public transport and nearby highways keeps you seamlessly linked to the wider city.
lifestyle_benefits: step into green parks and cafes
blend of historic peace and modern work-life connections
short commutes to top neighbourhood schools
target_buyer: Ideal for families seeking historic atmosphere coupled with modern amenities, especially those wanting outdoor space for children and proximity to lively urban features.
market_positioning: A rare opportunity for families looking to own a spacious historic house in Zamosc’s UNESCO-listed core, uniquely offering both architectural grandeur and forward-thinking conveniences at a competitive price in the heart of Stare Miasto.
